front.title: Requirements for Securing SCTP Traffic using DTLS

abstract.t: The current specification of DTLS over SCTP is outdated and does not fulfill the requirements of 3GPP. This Internet Draft documents the requirements of 3GPP for securing SCTP based communications using DTLS. It is a result of a design team in TSVWG and reflects the current of its work. Therefore, this document is expected to change over time.
